headline.main: Immunities of Congress; House Inquiry Seeks Light on Problem Posed by Fish

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 11 -- When the House Judiciary Committee tomorrow begins to examine the laws and the precedents concerning the legal immunities of members of Congress, before determining whether Representative Fish of New York shall respond to a grand jury subpoena, it will review the history of the greatest struggles in the history of democracy.
